item.title: Introduction to aws EMR
item.description: Recently I have to deal with data pipeline with large volumn of data. I was using python script first to make plenty of sessions query for each row of data because of cascading query between different tables. This caused bottleneck for only 400,000 rows of data which required almost 2 hrs of processing time. I have used different approches like batch querying the dimension table or even async programming to separate the compute and insert operation.
